alert.note: Alert for Clay; Duval; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 12:50PM EDT until July 09 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ST. JOHNS...NORTHEASTERN CLAY AND DUVAL COUNTIES... At 1249 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Normandy to Doctors Inlet, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1240 PM, NAS JAX reported a gust to 62 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Unf, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Arlington, Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach and Neptune Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
